name: Hauntiques
description:
Instructions and controls are all provided in-game.

Performance Notice:
The game can take a bit of time to load in between levels (10-30s). Sorry!

Accessibility/Cheat Option: 
If you would like to quickly go through process of cleaning the antiques, hold the letter O while cleaning to supersize your brush. If you would like to fully enjoy the game, we suggest you try to clean at least one of the antiques as intended!

Credits:
Art and Animation - Opertura (Aya and Jason) - http://opertura.org/
Programming - Yori Kvitchko - https://twitter.com/yorikv
Music - Sidney Satorsky - https://sidneysatorsky.bandcamp.com/
Sound Effects - Ludovic
3D Models - Dustin Woods - https://altru.itch.io/
